policies.involuntary_refund: Force majeure clause: a credit valid for 1 year may be issued upon proof and timely notice.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
In case of schedule change decided by the company:
- Modification without fee
- Cancellation without fee
- Refund upon request
- Free transfer to another flight if more adapted and suitable for the guest
- No waiver code required.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Refunds are permitted based on fare conditions and must be requested from the original ticket issuer. Refunds include taxes if eligible. The carrier may deny refunds if:
- The request is made after ticket validity expires.
- The ticket was used for visa entry and the passenger cannot prove onward travel.
- The passenger was denied entry and returned.
- The ticket is forged, stolen, or counterfeit.
- The passenger was refused transport due to violation.
Refunds are governed by local regulations.
policies.medical_refund: Escalation is recommended if fare rules are unclear. No public waiver code policy. Agents must confirm case-by-case or contact Air Moana support.
policies.name_change:
- Name correction allowed.
- Up to 3 characters in the first name and 3 characters in the last name can be modified before ticketing.
- No name change (passenger substitution) is allowed.
policies.group_booking:
Contact our group department (groupe@airmoana.pf).
Air Moana offers group rates for 10+ adult passengers traveling on the same flight.
Required for a quote:
- Contact details of group lead
- Passenger count (adults/children/infants)
- Destination and travel date
- Trip purpose
- Group fares are subject to review and are not guaranteed without confirmation.
policies.infant_policy:
- Infants under 2 years old can travel on the lap of a parent or guardian at a 90% discount on the adult fare (plus taxes).
- A special life jacket and seat belt will be provided for the infant during the flight.
- No UMNR accepted.
- It is possible to associate an infant with a ticketed adult.
policies.baggage_policy:
The allowed checked baggage allowance varies from 15 kg to 46 kg per passenger depending on fare conditions:
- 46 kg for tickets: Flex 46K
- 23 kg for tickets: Flex 23K, Standard 23K, Special Offer 23K
- 15 kg for tickets: Flex 15K, Special Offer 15K, Blue Fare
Please note, the maximum weight per piece is 32 kg.
policies.seat_request_policy: Seats to be assigned in the GDS.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy: No published 24-hour void or same-day cancellation policy. Refer to fare conditions or contact the issuing agent for urgent changes.
